org.zaproxy.zap

Class ZapHttpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection
      • org.zaproxy.zap.ZapHttpConnection

  • public class ZapHttpConnection
extends org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection
    Custom HttpConnection that exposes its socket and avoids closing.

      • getSocket

        public Socket getSocket()
        Returns the socket of this connection object. Make socket available, as parent getSocket() is protected.
        Overrides:
        getSocket in class org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection
        Returns:
        Outgoing (remote) socket connection.

      • closeSocketAndStreams

        protected void closeSocketAndStreams()
        Avoid closing in- & output stream as that would close the underlying socket also. We have to keep it for our WebSocket connection.
        Overrides:
        closeSocketAndStreams in class org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection
